text:
Dear Sir/Madam,

During the execution of build.xml using Ant, if the exe specified in the target crashes..ant is not stopping the execution of the build.xml..instead it hangs.


My target exe executes some shell scripts remotely.

Could you please specify why?


with best regards,
  Gupta.
creator: klkvgupta@yahoo.com

text:
Dear Gupta, please use the user mailing list for support requests.

In order to help you, we'd need to know a lot more details.  In particular, how do you execute the remote command (which task) and what exactly does crash mean?
